title: Characterization Morpho-Structure of Instant Soups Dried by Oven and Freeze-Dried
content: Currently, the increase of the increase in overweight and obesity at the world level causes serious health problems that affect the life quality of people. t is attributed to the great demand on the part of consumers to purchase instant foods, which have the problem of having low nutritional content and high percentages of sodium, which leads to a long-term health risk. Hence, the market needs to offer innovative products with better nutritional aspects, which are gaining greater strength and interest in people. The food industry is constantly changing since the needs and requirements of consumers change over time; therefore, the industry develops, improves, and innovates in food products without losing sight of the nutritional needs of consumers, foreseeing new techniques for preparing and preserving food. The aim is to make an instant soup based on different flours with a high protein and fiber content and two different drying methods: oven and freeze-dried.
